text: Take Care of My Little Girl is 1951 American drama movie directed by Jean Negulesco and is based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Peggy Goodin. It stars Jeanne Crain, Dale Robertson, Mitzi Gaynor, Jean Peters, Jeffrey Hunter, Helen Westcott and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jean Negulesco
title: Take Care of My Little Girl
